title: Portishead - Glory Times (1995) [FLAC]
description:
Portishead - Glory Times (1995) [FLAC]

Glory Times is a 1995 compilation album by Portishead which contains mixes of songs from Dummy as well as the theme from their short film To Kill a Dead Man. The two discs are the same as the respective singles for "Sour Times" and "Glory Box".
